whispers.text: Unregistered presence detected near a Continental entrance.
Marker exchange confirmed in an alley with no cameras.
Coin flow spike traced to a bank that doesn't exist on paper.
A Council seat has not spoken publicly in three cycles. No one is comfortable with the silence.
Safehouse lights stayed on long after everyone supposedly left.
An operator thought retired checked in under a very familiar alias.
Continental staff in one city are being rotated unusually fast.
Three cities reported the same unknown codename on the same night.
A usually quiet port has registered more departures than arrivals.
Someone requested old High Table minutes. No one will admit who.
Ledger values no longer match the number of coins in circulation.
If your alias appears twice on the same list, burn the list.
An adjudication that was never scheduled is already in motion.
Doors that used to open on the first knock now require three.
Heat maps show activity in a city the Directory considers dormant.
